subject: Playoff Games
Football
lead_paragraph: Houston, which had often faltered in the past, engineered a remarkable turnaround and earned its first playoff berth — yet was overshadowed by the late-game heroics of Tim Tebow.
snippet: Houston, which had often faltered in the past, engineered a remarkable turnaround and earned its first playoff berth — yet was overshadowed by the late-game heroics of Tim Tebow.
